entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kimmirut
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.4°C
entry.summary:

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
